places.name: McDonald's
places.description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.

featured_reviews.review_id: Ive been to this location a few times. I feel like it's a typical fast-food place. Long lines, short staffed, and not clean. It takes forever to get through the drive through, so I usually go in and order. The staff seems pleasant, but management has to get enough people working to speed things up!
featured_reviews.review_text: Ive been to this location a few times. I feel like it's a typical fast-food place. Long lines, short staffed, and not clean. It takes forever to get through the drive through, so I usually go in and order. The staff seems pleasant, but management has to get enough people working to speed things up!

featured_reviews.review_id: Very dirty, rubbish on the floor, dirty tables, disgusting to sit down, only takeaway food in such conditions.  Dirty glass .. door handles too.  Really, if the old institution does not need to be looked after?  Where does the administrator, manager look???  I'll attach a photo, but it's just a piece of everything that's there.

featured_reviews.review_id: Well, the food is the usual mcd's food.  What got to me was how messy the place was.  Tables not cleaned, garbage on the floor, I had to clean my own table in order to eat in.  It was not busy at all. They were all hiding behind the counter. The supervisor just walked by all the garbage and did not assign anyone to clean up.  Saw this happen 3 times.  Remember, this place was NOT busy only 3 customers eating in.

featured_reviews.review_id: 3/4 full milkshake and ham on my egg only McMuffin. You guys can't be proud of this come on. The people were friendly at least
featured_reviews.review_text: 3/4 full milkshake and ham on my egg only McMuffin. You guys can't be proud of this come on. The people were friendly at least

featured_reviews.review_id: Always short staffed.  Management needs to learn how to schedule. Drive thru is always busy so i prefer going in and ordering pick up. Also, i have seen delivery drivers waiting 20 to 30 minutes for their order. It should be first come first serve. Employees are hard working but poor management made me rate 1 star to this restaurant

Also, i have seen delivery drivers waiting 20 to 30 minutes for their order. It should be first come first serve. Employees are hard working but poor management made me rate 1 star to this restaurant

featured_reviews.review_id: Only found out it was mobile pick up only after 10 when I got there. Can't call an order in have to download the app. They took 25 minutes for three orders. Also there's mice in the store
featured_reviews.review_text: Only found out it was mobile pick up only after 10 when I got there. Can't call an order in have to download the app. They took 25 minutes for three orders. Also there's mice in the store

featured_reviews.review_id: I ordered a 6 piece chicken meal and a big Mac meal +  drinks. When I got to my place, everything was there except the chicken nuggets.  I called them to let them of their mistake, as they don't check to make sure your order is all inside. I went back to pick up the chicken nuggets,  but it was an inconvenience,  a second trip, and I had to wait for it. It took almost 1/2 hour for them to give me my nuggets. When I got back home, the rest of my food was cold. Advised: always check your order before leaving the drive thru.

featured_reviews.review_id: 1st McDonald's in Burnaby B.C. that made my brother and myself wish we tried this location earlier. The food was not as greasy like back at home, and had flavor. Definitely going back to this location when I'm down there again.

places.address: McDonald's, 4410 Still Creek Dr, Burnaby, BC V5C 6C6

featured_reviews.review_id: I received terrible attention from the staff who was around 11:30 p.m.  We placed the order at the table, after waiting a long time, we decided to ask what was happening.  Our order was ready, no one left it on the table (there wasn't a lot of people) no one made the call to pick it up.  When I asked, the girl said that she didn't bring the things to the table, she threw the envelope at us on the counter, we told her that it was for eating there, so she took the envelope and put it on the tray that she put back on the table. meson.  I feel upset by the treatment delivered.  I have a copy of the ticket and details.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I went to McDonalds Still Creek yesterday at around 16:30.
It's a nice place with very easy parking.
Staff are kind and very professional, service is great!
I also noticed that the Drive through is fast as well.
featured_reviews.review_text:
I went to McDonalds Still Creek yesterday at around 16:30.
It's a nice place with very easy parking.
Staff are kind and very professional, service is great!
I also noticed that the Drive through is fast as well.

featured_reviews.review_id:
There's typically enough parking available. The upstairs seating area offers plenty of space, making it a great spot for families or groups. The food quality consistently meets my expectations, and the service is reliable. The availability of kiosks is a convenient touch, especially during busy hours.

However, there are some downsides to consider. The downstairs seating area is quite limited, which can be a drawback during crowded periods. It's also worth noting that the upstairs area may close at night, limiting your options for seating. Lastly, be prepared for potential wait times, as occasionally, there can be delays in receiving your order.

In summary, this McDonald's location is a dependable choice with a few minor inconveniences. If you value parking availability, good food, and a variety of seating options, it's worth a visit, just be mindful of potential wait times and seating restrictions.

featured_reviews.review_id: I placed a mobile order in the parking lot around noon, when I went into the store, my order was the only order in the display. However,  it took 30 minutes for them to fulfill the order and I had to ask several times for my order. That is the worst experience I have had. Not very consistent service level.

However,  it took 30 minutes for them to fulfill the order and I had to ask several times for my order. That is the worst experience I have had. Not very consistent service level.

featured_reviews.review_id:
We just got take out and drove off to find out that our quarter pounder had mayo even though we didn't ask for that add-on + unselected the sauce it comes with. The chicken sandwich was bought so we could try the sauce it comes with and we also found out it didn't have any of that sauce but mayonnaise. It looks like they just threw a huge amount of it to the sandwich and closed it.... The chicken is almost burned - extremely dry.

Inedible items and unrefundable money

featured_reviews.review_id: Super friendly staff here. Gross dark rainy morning and they still made me feel at home. Gave my own clean reusable coffee cup to use and they filled it without issue. Smiling-faced staff handed me my breakfast and wished me a good day

This iced drink provides me with so much upside while putting down very little capital. Thanks you, I will not be clown shoed again

places.name: McDonald's
places.description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
places.address: McDonald's, 4801 Hastings St, Burnaby, BC V5C 2L1

featured_reviews.review_id: Terrible food. Terrible service. McDonalds doesn't care. Their staff doesn't care. Couldn't even bite into this garbage. Burnt. Rock hard. Use to be a quick and inexpensive option but becoming more and more pricey. Long waits in drive through. Food inedible due to over salting and dirty tasting cooking oil. Staff barely acknowledges you. Great motivation to never eat fast food ever again.
featured_reviews.review_text: Terrible food. Terrible service. McDonalds doesn't care. Their staff doesn't care. Couldn't even bite into this garbage. Burnt. Rock hard. Use to be a quick and inexpensive option but becoming more and more pricey. Long waits in drive through. Food inedible due to over salting and dirty tasting cooking oil. Staff barely acknowledges you. Great motivation to never eat fast food ever again.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Grabbed a game day Big Mac deal here. It was freshly made and for $3, a great deal!

I have been to this McDonald's for decades, going back to its original location on Hastings and Alpha. This "newer" location is smaller, but has a more modern atmosphere.

Staff are courteous, efficient, and patient. Drive thru and in-restaurant ordering experiences were always positive.

Parking is plenty, but due to the elongated space, you're a little further away a lot of times.

Food-wise, due to traffic volume, is more often fresh than not. Besides the Still Creek location, I find this location one of the more reliable McDonald's for consistent fresh quality food.

Great spot to pop in if you're hungry for McDonald's!

featured_reviews.review_id: I've live all across the lower mainland. This is now my closest McDonald's and go to. Compared to others, yes needs better management I don't go here often but every time I do it's much slower than others. Last time they told me to park my car for 2 cheeseburgers. I said no its fine. I don't mind waiting here, I said nicely. I rolled up my window and sat there on my phone. They had a long line in drive through. My burgers came within 30 seconds. Lol I hate it I dunno y they make me wait most times for a normal order. I'm not ordering the pizza or anything out of the ordinary. So loophole just hold the line up. LOL THEY HAVE TO PRIORITIZE YOU AND GET THE LINE MOVING. And as I was taught. The customer service. It's a virus. If ONE person has bad service it can spread, possibly this someone who has been there a long time with seniority? I do believe it can trickle down. Well if he's being lazy then I'm being lazy. Monkey c monkey do.

featured_reviews.review_id: I tried to visit this location for breakfast on July 31st 2023. I was in the line  to order before 11am and was placing my order by 11:02am. Despite being in line before the breakfast cutoff and only being 2 minutes passed 11am I was told the breakfast menu was no longer available. Kinda frustrating as I'm sure they could rather easily accommodated my order but instead choice to turn me away. This is the first time I've been to a McDonald's location in a while and now I remember why.

featured_reviews.review_id: The service at this McDonald's has decreased exponentially. The late night staff seems to always have some sort of argument as to why they can't serve me the food I ordered. Today I ordered something as simple as a large ice water and the guy told me that I was unable to order that I told him I was willing to pay for it and he said sorry I don't want to do it. This makes no sense to me I've never been to a restaurant where you're willing to pay for a product and they say no to you especially if it's just WATER. Especially when you're spending 30 to $40 each time just for two people you would expect better service. I hope management gets involved in actually makes a difference and teaches these people customer service it seems that customer service has gone down the drain. The employees act annoyed to serve you. It's super sad. I miss the good old days of good customer service. Not a Karen just want basic customer service.

featured_reviews.review_id:
To be fair, for your average McDonalds chain this has to be one of the best i have visited.
Restaurant, dining area and restrooms are clean, well maintained, spacious and apply a COVID friendly and sensible approach.
Staff are pleasant and prompt.
They also have a pretty big drive through in a convenient location.
featured_reviews.review_text:

They also have a pretty big drive through in a convenient location.

featured_reviews.review_id: Avoid it if you could...Don't make a curbside order. Two Coffee takes 8-10 minutes as they wait for everyone's order to be completed before taking them out. Drive through is no good either as you'd be asked to wait by the curbside.... Coffee is hit and miss. Better make your own as quality is  good as water. It sucks as sometimes you need one on the go. Staff in charge of coffee is probably too lazy to change and brew a new batch. Just waste of time.

featured_reviews.review_id: Paid $0.30 to add leaf lettuce to my Filet-O-Fish.  They put rotten leaves hoping that a customer will not look inside a sandwich especially if it's a take out. featured_reviews.review_id:

Big Mac not created how it should be.
1. Big Mac sauce everywhere but in between the buns
2. Extra pickles nowhere to be found

featured_reviews.review_id: Purchased kid's meal with apple slices as takeout for dinner. We began eating (within half an hour of purchase) only to find white mold on the apple slices. We were already halfway through the apple slices. Absolutely disgusting. Poor food quality control.

featured_reviews.review_id: Tables are unacceptably filthy. It looked like it hasn't been sanitized or cleaned for a week. Garbages are full. Washroom was disgustingly dirty as well. Floors were sticky.

featured_reviews.review_id: Hello everyone, I just wanna let everybody know about my experience at this location. I went there this morning to grab a cup of coffee and a blueberry muffin. No problem with ordering or going to the window. The problem my head was after I drove away and I was ready to take a sip of my thoughts, so hot coffee ended up being ice cold as far as my muffin well, it literally looks like somebody stuck their finger into it and did not smell very pleasant. It looked really gross and another thing was it felt like it was in the freezer and it was defrosting and they gave it to me. It looks like a disaster. It was so disgusting looking at it. I ended up throwing it out into the bush for the birds to eat and I feel bad for them and my coffee. I just dumped it out and just went over to Tim Hortons after and I actually got a hot coffee and a really nice muffin way to go McDonald's anyways everybody have a wonderful day thank you for taking the time to read this

featured_reviews.review_id: Lady doing parked drive through orders at like 9:50pm on Friday (Aug 4) was giving us attitude while giving us our food then, while walking away hit our car mirror with her tray as she stormed away. Next time if you have a problem, speak up instead of hitting our car because you're mad. Appreciate it thank you.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Thank goodness for Barbie! <3
She was in the middle of a task but stopped to help me.
5+ other staff were standing with their backs to customers, chatting & laughing. Those staff need to be trained more!

At least make eye contact w/ customers & say "just a moment." Work is not supposed to be about socializing w/ coworkers. Do some work first!

featured_reviews.review_id: The burger in picture 1 and picture 2 are from here, compared with the same burgers from other branches, which is not the same level at all. Many times I chose the  customization, but they did wrong. I don't know how they can cook a fast food so bad and the vegetables are always not fresh...
featured_reviews.review_text: The burger in picture 1 and picture 2 are from here, compared with the same burgers from other branches, which is not the same level at all. Many times I chose the  customization, but they did wrong. I don't know how they can cook a fast food so bad and the vegetables are always not fresh...

featured_reviews.review_id: I ordered at the kiosk a large fries and a cheeseburger. Went over to the pickup section and on the screen, I was the 2nd number down. There were about 8 total orders waiting. ALL of them were served before mine. Fine whatever. I finally got my order. After opening it, they gave us a medium fries instead of a large. I can't do anything about it now but when you're paying almost $5 for a large...... the medium wasn't even fresh fries and not full either.
featured_reviews.review_text: I ordered at the kiosk a large fries and a cheeseburger. Went over to the pickup section and on the screen, I was the 2nd number down. There were about 8 total orders waiting. ALL of them were served before mine. Fine whatever. I finally got my order. After opening it, they gave us a medium fries instead of a large. I can't do anything about it now but when you're paying almost $5 for a large...... the medium wasn't even fresh fries and not full either.

featured_reviews.review_id:
**Update** To everyone who has had a negative experience with this location, please fill out a contact form on the McDonald's app or website and file a complaint. They told me this location is already flagged and on their radar. I took the chance and ordered two breakfast sandwiches today and one of them was wrong, and the other had ZERO sauce. The chicken tasted old. Absolutely disgusting.

Third review since this McDonald's keeps deleting them since they don't like hearing the truth!!

In short:

Always check your order before you leave because they usually mess it up and forget something or give you the wrong item.

The food quality is horrendous and does not meet the franchise standards. You might receive a burger with barely any sauce, bread will be burnt, fries are half full and upside down in the bag, etc.

The facility is usually dirty.

Staff are cranky and never know what they are doing.

I've sent in complaints to McDonald's via Twitter and email and they have responded and told me they will be following up with this location.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I am unsure of the purpose of the monitor if I cannot find my order and have to rely on the staff for updates every time. Despite their assurances that it is on its way, I believe that if an order is not ready, it should be displayed on the monitor.

It seems that the orders are removed from the monitor to showcase how quickly they serve customers. However, in reality, there is often a backlog of orders waiting to be fulfilled behind the counter. This raises concerns about the integrity of McDonald's practices.

I am curious whether anyone from McDonald's reads customer reviews and takes them into consideration.

From attached picture, you can see people waiting for their orders while there are only two order on the monitor.
featured_reviews.review_text:

I am curious whether anyone from McDonald's reads customer reviews and takes them into consideration.

From attached picture, you can see people waiting for their orders while there are only two order on the monitor.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I get that McDonald's is fast food. But on about 3 occasions my egg mc muffins have been unedibles. To the point that when I gave it to a coworker they threw it straight in the garbage.

The grease was so bad it was seeping through the wrapper all over the place. I've been to many McDonald's and never seen it this bad on numerous occasions.

Plus coffee is never consistent.

Really hate giving bad reviews but do yourself a favour and get something edible elsewhere.

Staff are nice tho.

featured_reviews.review_id: Cup leaks and it was the most chaotic walk to work I've ever had. Imagine burning fingers, holding your purse & lunch bag and trying to avoid dripping coffee on your work clothes. Also gave me the wrong item for breakfast.
featured_reviews.review_text: Cup leaks and it was the most chaotic walk to work I've ever had. Imagine burning fingers, holding your purse & lunch bag and trying to avoid dripping coffee on your work clothes. Also gave me the wrong item for breakfast.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Been giving this place quite a few chances but their service is the worst compared to other McDonald's locations I've been at. I understand that they're a fast food chain but it doesn't excuse the fact that their workers seem so unhappy at dealing with their customers.
Multiple times they've missed my orders (e.g. no fries when I ordered a meal with medium fries) and I mostly order takeout so I can't just easily inform them of the missing items. I know I should double check my orders before I leave but there are times when I forget and as a customer we do rely and expect on the servers to give you your correct and complete order.

Lastly, they will close and no longer accept orders 10minutes before closing. I've worked at a fast food place as a teenager and we were required to keep our store open to customers at the last minute. The employee on the counter had to raise her voice to tell us that they will no longer be accepting food orders and that we should leave.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id: Mindy the manager was extremely rude to me when I asked her to unlock the bathroom downstairs. She said go upstairs I said no my mom needs to use the bathroom downstairs. She ignored me. I had to tell her again and I said my mom is handicap she can't go up the stairs she needs the bathroom. She looked at me like "who cares" and her other staff ignored me again. I had to basically tell them to open the door and  when I told Mindy she was rude she started arguing with me and talking to me as if we were in a brawl. Completely unprofessional for a "manager" to act this way! She argued with me and even customers were shaking their head at what she was doing. When someone needs to use the bathroom it should not matter what the reason is. I did not need to explain to her that my mother is handicap and is unable to go up the stairs. I have never been to this location but I do have to say it's one of the worst experiences I have ever had. Mindy needs management skills training. Horrible experience! The best part is when you complain to their upper management they always say "will look into it" and nothing gets fixed or done. Upper management will read this and do absolutely nothing and continue on because that's what McDonald's management do "nothing".

featured_reviews.review_id:
Indian girl with make ups at cashier has attitude and gets orders wrong.

My mcchicken burger bread was torn off in the edge and it had spicy sauce on it when i ordered just regular one.

I ordered 2 double qt pounder w cheese and mcchicken instead got 2 mcchicken. GIVE MY MONEY BACK.

This location is total garbage

featured_reviews.review_id:
2nd time visiting, DO NOT EAT HERE, QUESTIONABLE SANITARY HABITS!!

Was disappointed the first time cause they didn't have nuggets cause machine was 'already cleaned', even though order was placed via mobile 20min before close.

This time...even worse...
They are missing a lot of items on the menu, and make your burger with BARE HANDS (UNWASHED)!! This has caused me to have stomachache!!

Taste 1/1*
Tastes like McDonalds

Value 0/1*
Costs like McDonalds, for the cleanliness however, not worth your health

Service 0/1*
Rude and stuck up

Cleanliness -1/1*
As shown in video, they make your burgers without gloves (did not see them washing hands either)

Overall/Revisit 0/1*
Never again!

Paying for ambience?
Above and beyond? 0/+1*

featured_reviews.review_id: So i ordered the quarter pound no cheese, what i got was a soggy bread, a patty few pieces of onion, an eye drop of sauce and single piece of pickle. I showed it to the manager and she actually didnt see a problem with that picture. I asked them to redo my order and put more stuff and sauce in the burger. After waiting 10 mins i got a reheated burger with an additional SINGLE slice of pickle!!!! Save your money go somewhere else

featured_reviews.review_id: Busy location but they're efficient and I like how they have a screen showing your number in progress or ready.
featured_reviews.review_text: Busy location but they're efficient and I like how they have a screen showing your number in progress or ready.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Absolutely useless staff.
Over charges constantly..I actually drive an extra 10 minutes to avoid this place. Over charged 5 dollars on a coffee and breakfast sandwich....tried the app and it crashed and they had no idea how to fix it. Cost me 21 dollars and no help from them.
I've been going here since 1985....I'll never set foot in there again. Whoever is in charge retire already.

places.name: McDonald's

places.address: McDonald's, 3695 Lougheed Hwy., Vancouver, BC V5M 2A6

featured_reviews.review_id: Telling me my food will take a extra 3 minutes because they cooking it is once thing but telling me that then serving me coke food right after saying that isn't acceptable. A lot of McDonald's in the east Vancouver area not up to standards. They should take notes from the locations around Coquitlam, Richmond and South Vancouver where they follow the McDonald's standards of quality to the T
featured_reviews.review_text: Telling me my food will take a extra 3 minutes because they cooking it is once thing but telling me that then serving me coke food right after saying that isn't acceptable. featured_reviews.review_id:
Slow clap for this location

Food is typical for McDonald's.

Service, we'll this location is horrible, everytime I come here I get told to park and wait for my order. A fry burger and a pop. How sad it is that they cannot have enough food ready to go. I understand that demand is higher at certain times but 25 minutes from order to getting food is ridiculous. And when you refuse to be parked you get even worse service because now you are going against the normal, it's a drive thru and I should have to pull over and wait. While I sat and waited for my order 6 to 7 vehicles were parked so they can make their time for drive thru.  Truly terrible management for thinking this is acceptable to treat customers like this.

After receiving my order my fry level is laughable. Ordered junior McChicken extra mayo and received my mcchicken with no mayo

How do you mess that up.
Completely unacceptable.

Corporate McDonald's needs to review this location and it's management for customer service and drive thru operations.

featured_reviews.review_id: Worst McDonald's experience I've ever had...We waited in the drive thru for quite a long time not that big a deal though because they only have 1 window, but we ordered our food and went to pay and they forgot to add our coupon and we had to ask them again to add it, we got home with the food only to find the fries cold soggy tasting of disgusting old rancid oil and the boxes less than half full, the 20 nuggets were the same, literally inedible, the burgers were completely the wrong order, my burger has onions which I'm allergic to so was not edible, we paid 40$ just to throw it all in the trash, we definitely deserve a refund, but I'm not convinced the owners of this location care at all about the food or the service, the bar is so low but it is quite literally the hands down worst McDonald's I've ordered from ever

featured_reviews.review_id: Ordered a ice cream cone gave me some sorry excuse for an ice cream cone asked if it was a joke and the lady said nothing and just walked away for me. I went inside show the manager and pointed out ice cream cones being served other people.
featured_reviews.review_text: Ordered a ice cream cone gave me some sorry excuse for an ice cream cone asked if it was a joke and the lady said nothing and just walked away for me. I went inside show the manager and pointed out ice cream cones being served other people.

featured_reviews.review_id: I have found that since food delivery services began I spend more time going to the "Grill order parking" for even the the simplest order. I'm ordering for one, not a mini van full! McDonald's needs to concentrate on the loyal customer at the counter as opposed to the Skip the dishes orders.

featured_reviews.review_id: I think the picture says it all.... what happened to my patty? I literally just opened the box and found it like this? Billion dollar company, guys.
featured_reviews.review_text: I think the picture says it all.... what happened to my patty? I literally just opened the box and found it like this? Billion dollar company, guys.

featured_reviews.review_id: Ordered a poutine with meal. First of all they charge way higher than any nearby McDonald's for it. And what I got was a smaller one with no enough gravy and with cold cheese. Completely disappointed. Seems like they forgot to heat the food nowadays.
featured_reviews.review_text: Ordered a poutine with meal. First of all they charge way higher than any nearby McDonald's for it. And what I got was a smaller one with no enough gravy and with cold cheese. Completely disappointed. Seems like they forgot to heat the food nowadays.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I did drive through non the evening. There were three cars ahead of me and it look some time to get to me. I already ordered online through the app and went to the next window. Waited for some time about ten minutes or just shy. They had a screen that showed the timing for the queue and they they were hitting over time for many... They told me that fries are taking longer than expected. I was okay with that but at least they were transparent and updated me.

Other wise the food was was good. Quarter pounder was a little dried for some reason but still good. Milkshake was at the right thickness by the time I got home which is good cuz I just want to drink it. Fries were still definitely made fresh.

featured_reviews.review_id:
1. Conveniently located with many bus routes around.
2. Generous sitting area.
3. Easy drive through window.

5. Clean washrooms.
6. Quiet with abundant electric outlets.
7. Sitting area with great natural light.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I ordered a double Big Mac, 2 meat patties are missing (should be 4 I only got 2)? Whole piece of lettuce instead of shred lettuce? The sauce inside is mayo instead of mac sauce? And I asked for extra onion, not surprisingly, there is no onion...

featured_reviews.review_id: Ate at this McDonald's twice, both times the food was consistent as expected. I used the self-serve kiosk so I do not have any strong opinions regarding the service although I was asked if I had been helped by an employee after placing my order so that was good. Good amount of parking and accessible. Would have liked to see the booth seating repaired near the window as one of the seats was missing.

featured_reviews.review_id: I ordered mcdouble like a mac but got this extra stuff on my burger. I dont know what those are, but Im not eating that. Very disappointed.
featured_reviews.review_text: I ordered mcdouble like a mac but got this extra stuff on my burger. I dont know what those are, but Im not eating that. Very disappointed.

featured_reviews.review_id: Very well organized.  They aim to get your order done quickly.  As a senior the electronic menu had its challenges, but assistance helped as needed. Very clean and pleasant experience.
featured_reviews.review_text: Very well organized.  They aim to get your order done quickly.  As a senior the electronic menu had its challenges, but assistance helped as needed. Very clean and pleasant experience.

featured_reviews.review_id: Went through the drive through. The gentleman, taking orders and manning the take out window was amazing. Had the best attitude and made me feel extremely happy. I really appreciate service like this after a hard nights work. I forgot to ask his name or I would add it here. Above and beyond.
featured_reviews.review_text: Went through the drive through. The gentleman, taking orders and manning the take out window was amazing. Had the best attitude and made me feel extremely happy. I really appreciate service like this after a hard nights work. I forgot to ask his name or I would add it here. Above and beyond.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Every time I order a root beer in the drive-thru, I forget to check it and the syrup is always out. They'll still serve it, but it's always out. Fortunately I checked before leaving the parking lot this time, which means I'm also remembering to review it.

It would honestly be better for them to remove root beer as an option altogether rather than to continue to rip people off. Last thing I'm thinking about when I'm getting 'fast food' is whether or not the staff is doing something as simple as changing the syrup... I'm, beginning to think they're intentionally cutting corners.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Rude signs that include lies and go against McDonald's corporate regulations. All these regulations have been dropped.. so then what is it? Then very direct rude signs from the tyrant management. They also closed the top section because they already don't ever cleanup.

I haven't been here in years, but I used to love this location and now I am appalled. The staff even looked as if they were dead inside. Clearly there is an issue with the owner or manager and corporate is not aware of the situation.

This location used to be packed and is now dismal at best.
